name: PetriFine !
description:
Control an army of minions and reach the end of each level to escape the crypt you're locked in ! Minions are able to petrify themselves to create platforms, or to launch themselves towards a destructible item.

Be careful though ! Each ability will cost the minion its life. If you want to reach the exit, sacrifices must be made...

JUMP : A | Spacebar 

MOVE : Left Joystick | ZQSD 

PETRIFY : RB | B 

LUNGE : RT | LMB 

GATHER : LT | RMB

This game was made by a 7-person team during the ENJAM 2021, with the theme "Sacrifices must be made".

TEAM :

  • Alice a.k.a. Masalirow : ___________3D Artist / Animator
  • Yann a.k.a. TheGalgenHumor : ___2D Artist
  • Rudy a.k.a. Xiff : __________________3D Artist / Level Designer
  • Marc Cerutti a.k.a. m21cerutti : __Programmer
  • Maxime a.k.a. MaxInk : ___________Programmer  (@LCO_MaxInk)
  • Martin Rabiller a.k.a. Narumik : __Sound Designer / Music Composer
  • Antoine Brousse a.k.a. Twn : _____Game/Level Designer (@twnbrs)
